name: Cobwebbed
description:
Cobwebbed is a turn based strategy game about linking up different spiders in a big web and making sure they all get enough flies to eat.

Every spider has it's favourite flies it wants to eat and you collect the flies by creating strings between different parts of the web, knowing where the flies will fly beforehand. Will you connect all the spiders or will you lose a spider on the way?

Controls: Left mouse click for everything.

Made by:
Jelle Steinmann
Odysseas Tsiridis
Roel Jansen
Tim van Poppel
